mapper.select: SELECT seq, main, type, date, solar, contact_seq FROM contact_memoryday
SELECT seq, main, type, date, solar, contact_seq FROM contact_memoryday WHERE 1=1 AND seq=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contact_memoryday ( main, type, date, solar, contact_seq ) VALUES ( #{main}, #{type}, #{date}, #{solar}, #{contact_seq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE contact_memoryday SET main=#{main}, type=#{type}, date=#{date}, solar=#{solar} WHERE seq=#{seq}
